section.title:
tax zones
master list of Tax Zones
section.para: Tax Zones are geographic areas that have a specific tax jurisdiction and tax assignment. Tax Assignments are assigned on a Tax Zone and Tax Type basis to determine what tax structure to apply to a given item. To access the master list of Tax Zones, select the "Tax Zones" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Tax Zones" screen displays information on all existing Tax Zones, including Tax Zone area and Tax Zone description.
To the far right of the list, the following buttons are available:
